alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.5.2
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.5.2 for Tweeten! The latest update is just a minor update which fixes a few issues related to spell-check.

Thanks for all the love in the recent weeks :) Make sure to let us know if you have any feedback about Tweeten via Twitter (We are @TweetenApp on Twitter) or Slack.
